example.parse: (S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-2 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC والدة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاخير))) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS رددت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اسم) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ابن) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))) (SBAR-MNR (SUB_CONJ و) (S (NP-TPC-3 (PRON_3FS هي)) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تلفظ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC انفاس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الاخيرة)))))))))) (PUNC ")))
